tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE identity_theft_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  victim_name TEXT,
  victim_address TEXT,
  theft_date DATE,
  theft_location TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE identity_theft_cases (
  case_id INT NOT NULL,
  victim_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  theft_date DATE NOT NULL,
  theft_location VARCHAR(255),
  PRIMARY KEY (case_id)
);

CREATE TABLE identity_theft_reports (
	report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	victim_name VARCHAR(100),
	report_date DATE,
	identity_theft_type VARCHAR(50),
	location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE stolen_identities (
	identity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	victim_id UUID,
	identity_type VARCHAR(50),
	stolen_date DATE,
	description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE identity_theft_patterns (
	pattern_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	pattern_name VARCHAR(100),
	frequency INT,
	location VARCHAR(255),
	common_methods TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE identity_theft_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    victim_name VARCHAR(50),
    theft_method TEXT,
    stolen_info TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE theft_locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(100),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    state VARCHAR(20),
    country VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE suspect_info (
    suspect_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    suspect_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender CHAR(1),
    occupation VARCHAR(50),
    location_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES theft_locations(location_id)
)

CREATE TABLE theft_methods (
    method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    method_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE IdentityTheftReports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    victim_name VARCHAR(50),
    perpetrator_name VARCHAR(50),
    theft_method VARCHAR(100),
    location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE IdentityTheftPatterns (
    pattern_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pattern_name VARCHAR(50),
    common_locations VARCHAR(100),
    common_theft_methods VARCHAR(100),
    average_victims_per_pattern INT
)

CREATE TABLE IdentityTheftSuspects (
    suspect_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    suspect_name VARCHAR(50),
    known_aliases VARCHAR(100),
    last_known_location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE IdentityTheftAlerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    alert_date DATE,
    alert_message VARCHAR(200)
)

CREATE TABLE IdentityTheftStatistics (
    statistic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    year INT,
    total_reports INT,
    total_victims INT,
    total_perpetrators INT
)
